document.heading: Low-emissions Motor Vehicle Tax Exemption Amendment Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-129, the “Low-emissions Motor Vehicle Tax Exemption Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-521 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 7, 2006, and April 4, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 21, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-347 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-129 became effective on June 16, 2006.
